#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation
= Development Introduction =

pswrdgen and pswrdgeniron is now on a quarterly development schedule since most major features are now implemented.  If you are interested in participating in this project email joesox.

== Developer Standards ==
We ask that all developers use the following guidelines to ensure stable versions and not break any versions of pswrdgeniron.

===pswrdgen.py development:===
  # Work with a copy of pswrdgen.py
  # Thoroughly test your working copy.
  # Repeat step 1 and 2 until no bugs.
  # Commit changes.
  # Update issue trackers.
  # Make sure joesox posts new epydoc version.

===pswrdgeniron development:===
  # Work with a copy of the pswrdgeniron Visual Studio project.
  # Make sure you are using the latest version of pswrdgen.py.
  # Thoroughly test your working copy.
  # Repeat step 1 and 2 until no bugs.
  # Commit changes.
  # Update issue trackers.
  # If needed, make sure joesox posts new epydoc version.
  # Make sure joesox updates pswrdgeniron's Codeproject website
